docs.text: Top-level package for PythonPPW. app ¶ Main module. test ( text ) ¶ Amazing function Parameters: Name Type Description Default text str What text to print required Source code in pythonppw/app.py def test ( text : str ): """Amazing function Args: text (str): What text to print """ print ( text )
docs.title: modules

docs.text: Amazing function Parameters: Name Type Description Default text str What text to print required Source code in pythonppw/app.py def test ( text : str ): """Amazing function Args: text (str): What text to print """ print ( text )
docs.title: test()

docs.text: Installation ¶ Stable release ¶ To install PythonPPW, run this command in your terminal: 1 pip install pythonppw This is the preferred method to install PythonPPW, as it will always install the most recent stable release. If you don't have pip installed, this Python installation guide can guide you through the process. From source ¶ The source for PythonPPW can be downloaded from the Github repo . You can either clone the public repository: 1 git clone git://github.com/GithubUser/pythonppw Or download the tarball : 1 curl -OJL https://github.com/GithubUser/pythonppw/tarball/master Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with: 1 pip install .
docs.title: installation
